overview: I am the owner of Forexearlywarning.com. We provide spot forex trading plans and live trading signals across 28 pairs.

milestones.description: Forexearlywarning has released The Forex Heatmap to all of its clients. The Forex Heatmap organizes the data from 20 currency pairs into a visual map. It is a dynamic real-time tool, live in the market. The Forex Heatmap gives a spot forex trader an easy-
